com.rohitsood.urlybird.client.gui
Class MainWindow

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      com.rohitsood.urlybird.client.gui.MainWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class MainWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame

The main window of the gui. This window is a JFrame which can hold internal frames. The window starts maximized to current screen size, default size is set to 640 by 480 pixels.

Version:
1.1
Author:
Rohit Sood
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

MainWindow

public MainWindow(GuiManager manager)
Constructs a MainWindow object. Initializes the window with a default size, then maximizes it.

Parameters:
manager - The GuiManager to register with.
Method Detail

init

private void init()
Initializes the frame. Adds a desktop pane, menu bar, window listener, and sets the title.
